channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 79% of Americans feel burned out as they put most vacation time toward errands, doctor visits, and family care
item.description: Results showed that workers with PTO used less than 40% of their time off specifically for rest and relaxation.

item.title: Instead of sipping Champagne on New Year’s Eve, it may be time to invest in it

item.description: These micro-habits can improve our lives.

item.title: Here’s what stores are open (and closed) on New Year’s Day 2025
item.description: Enjoy what might be your final day of holiday vacation.

item.title: New Year, new habits: 4 simple changes to help you age well
item.description: These habits are key building blocks for a healthier, longer life.

item.title: Tesla’s stock got a big Trump bump. Now Elon Musk needs to get back to work.
Steve Jobs adopted a no ‘bozos’ policy and said the best managers are those who never wanted the job—here are his 3 best management tips
item.description: Hiring only for “professional management” doesn’t work, Steve Jobs said.
